mapper.select: SELECT ls.id, ls.room_id, ls.`row`, ls.line, MAX(los.order_id) order_id, los.start_time, los.end_time, CASE WHEN los.`status` IS NULL THEN ls.`status` WHEN ls.`status` = 0 THEN 0 WHEN los.`status` = 1 THEN 1 WHEN los.`status` = 3 THEN 1 WHEN #{startTime} >= los.end_time THEN 1 WHEN #{endTime} <= los.start_time THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS `status` FROM lib_seat ls LEFT JOIN lib_order_seat los ON ls.id = los.seat_id WHERE ls.room_id = #{roomId} GROUP BY ls.id ORDER BY ls.id
